rules_text:
Draw two cards. Then if this spell wasn't cast from your hand, create a Function token with “Compose.” [i](It's an enchantment. As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, sacrifice any number of Functions to add their effects to that spell.)[/i]
Compose [i](Then if you cast this from your hand, exile it and create a Saga token with “r{3}–You may cast a copy of this card from exile without paying its mana cost.”)[/i]
